name: Sunset Diner (Yrving Souza)
description:
The Game:

You bought a restaurant on the brink of bankruptcy and now

you're on a mission to turn it into the best in town. 

For this, it will be necessary to manage it

 in the best possible way in order to periodically evolve 

using its management skills.

Development team:

Reinaldo Saldanha - Programming manager/ Game developer & UI/UX designer

Yrving Souza - Project manager/ Art director & Level Designer

João Victor Lima - 3D modeling /  LookDev  & Lead artist

Ana Luiza Gomes - 2D & UI Lead Artist

 Vitor Costa - Designer & tester

Gabriel Victor - Mechanics & controlling programmer

Rafael Henrique - AI & Interactions Programmer
